meanings.definition: To make (something) known to the public.
meanings.sent1: The company publicizes their new product through social media.
meanings.sent2: The local bakery publicizes their daily specials with colorful signs.
meanings.sent3: The magician publicizes his disappearing act, but never reveals the secret.
meanings.sent4: The sun publicizes its arrival with a burst of light each morning.
meanings.sent5: The teacher publicizes the upcoming test to ensure all students are prepared.

meanings.definition: To promote or advertise (something) to the general public.
meanings.sent1: The celebrity publicizes her latest movie on talk shows.
meanings.sent2: The charity organization publicizes their fundraising event on posters around town.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel publicizes its nut collection by burying them in various spots.
meanings.sent4: The river publicizes its strength by carving through the rocky terrain.
meanings.sent5: The chef publicizes the new menu items to attract more customers to the restaurant.
